name: render_data_visualization_3d
description: Create immersive 3D data visualizations including scatter plots, line graphs, bar charts, network graphs, and surface plots. Perfect for showing complex data relationships, trends, networks, and multi-dimensional datasets in an interactive 3D space. Supports animations, custom color schemes, labels, and multiple visualization types.

data.description: Array of data points with x, y, z coordinates. Each point can have optional value, label, and color properties.

y.description: Y coordinate position (height for bar charts)

label.description: Optional label to display near the point

type.description: Type of visualization: 'scatter' for point clouds, 'line' for connected path, 'bar' for 3D bar chart, 'network' for connected nodes, 'surface' for mesh surfaces

colorScheme.description: Color scheme: 'rainbow' for full spectrum, 'gradient' for blue gradient, 'categorical' for distinct colors, 'heatmap' for temperature-like colors

environment.description: Background environment: 'studio' for neutral gray, 'sunset' for warm, 'night' for dark blue, 'space' for black

slot.description: Layout slot where the visualization should appear
